publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5679 Chris Ballance: Westminster Vote on Trident—That the Parliament urges Members of the Westminster Parliament to vote "No" on 14 March 2007 to the Prime Minister, Tony Blair’s, proposal to replace Trident submarines. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Colin Fox*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Rosie Kane*, Ms Sandra White*, Campbell Martin*, Mark Ballard*

S2M-5679 Chris Ballance: Westminster Vote on Trident—That the Parliament urges Members of the Westminster Parliament to vote "No" on 14 March 2007 to the Prime Minister, Tony Blair’s, proposal to replace Trident submarines. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Colin Fox, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Rosie Kane, Ms Sandra White, Campbell Martin, Mark Ballard, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Shiona Baird*, Bill Butler*, Robin Harper*, Bruce Crawford*, John Swinburne*
S2M-5679 Westminster Vote on Trident (lodged on 1 March 2007) Marlyn Glen*, Patrick Harvie*
S2M-5679 Westminster Vote on Trident (lodged on 1 March 2007) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Elaine Smith*
S2M-5679 Westminster Vote on Trident (lodged on 1 March 2007) Alasdair Morgan*, Mike Pringle*, Kate Maclean*
S2M-5679 Westminster Vote on Trident (lodged on 1 March 2007) Pauline McNeill*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-5679 Westminster Vote on Trident (lodged on 1 March 2007) Dennis Canavan*

S2M-5679 Chris Ballance: Westminster Vote on Trident—That the Parliament urges Members of the Westminster Parliament to vote "No" on 14 March 2007 to the Prime Minister, Tony Blair’s, proposal to replace Trident submarines. Supported by: Tommy Sheridan, Colin Fox, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Rosie Kane, Ms Sandra White, Campbell Martin, Mark Ballard, Eleanor Scott, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Malcolm Chisholm, Shiona Baird, Bill Butler, Robin Harper, Bruce Crawford, John Swinburne, Marlyn Glen, Patrick Harvie, Mr Mark Ruskell, Elaine Smith, Alasdair Morgan, Mike Pringle, Kate Maclean, Pauline McNeill, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Dennis Canavan
